description: The decimal expansion of c^c^c^...  where c is the constant defined in A037077.
references: S. R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, pp. 448-452.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Power Tower
mathematica: n = 105; M = NSum[(-1)^n*(n^(1/n) - 1), {n, 1, Infinity}, WorkingPrecision -> n + 10, Method -> "AlternatingSigns"]; L = Log[M]; N[-ProductLog[-L]/L, n] (* Marvin Ray Burns, Mar 08 2013 *)
author: _Marvin Ray Burns_ Jan 20 2000, Mar 28 2008, Nov 08 2009, Mar 24 2010, Jun 27 2011
extensions: Simplified definition by _Marvin Ray Burns_, Mar 08 2013
